items.label: Register Online or In-Person
items.description: You need your ID/Annex and proof of address.

items.label: Check Hospitalization Coverage
items.description: Does your employer offer it? If not, buy it privately.

items.label: Find a Local General Practitioner (GP)
items.description: Use DoctorAnytime.be to find an English speaker near you.

items.label: Order 'Vignettes'
items.description: Stickers with your barcode. You need to stick these on every document you send to your mutuelle.
